content: 这是当地的推广人S.T.D.的俱乐部，一个大型地下空间，有三个房间，容量约600-800。他们每个周末都会上演节目，无论是拜访DJ和现场表演、本地推广人还是STDJ。 音乐往往是电的、高能的东西、陷阱和一些更大的巡回演出。偶尔乐队和说唱歌手也在那里表演。好有趣的地方去坚果。饮料价格便宜，啤酒或烈酒的价格约为30-40元人民币。注意：它们通常只在周五和周六开放，但有时在工作日晚上有一次性聚会。
contentEn: This is local promoter S.T.D.'s club, a large, underground space with three rooms and capacity for around 600–800. They put on shows every weekend, either with visiting DJs and live acts, local promoters or the STDJs. Music tends to be electro, high-energy stuff, trap, and some bigger touring acts. Occasionally bands and rappers perform there too. Good fun place to go nuts. Drinks are cheapish -- around 30-40rmb for beers or spirits. Note: They are usually only open Friday and Saturday, but sometimes have one-off parties on weeknights.
remarks:

address: B1/F, No.168 Julu Lu | 巨鹿路168号B1楼, 近瑞金一路
